project.description: BTDEX is a decentralized exchange system running on the Burst blockchain. It implements a unique non-custodial exchange method for cryptocurrencies and conventional fiat currencies based on BlockTalk Smart Contracts and Burstcoin on-chain encrypted messages. The exchange method is serverless and fees are distributed among Trade Token (TRT) holders.

release.change: Re-branded from Burst to Signum and BURST to SIGNA
Using the new address prefix S- instead of BURST-
